events.message: The policyholder reported an accident involving their vehicle striking a parked car on 2024-05-30 evening.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords referencing collision and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the vehicle collision claim and assist the customer.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the insured individual, confirming receipt and next steps.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicles, police accident report, and insurance policy details from the claimant.
Claimant submitted all requested documentation including photos, accident report, and vehicle registration promptly.
The investigation team began review of submitted evidence to assess the incident and validate the claim details.
Investigation completed confirming fault was with the claimant’s vehicle and damages are covered under policy.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and related costs has been proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and timely handling of the claim process.
Claim approval was granted based on full compliance with policy terms and verified damage assessment.
Settlement payment was issued electronically to the claimant’s bank account covering all approved repair costs.
The claim file has been officially closed after payment processed and confirmation of repair completion received.
All documentation and electronic records related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived.
